div.bibl: Scandia, Apr. 7, 1900. THE NORWEGIAN NATIONAL LEAGUE

body.p: The following report was given at the quarterly meeting of the Norwegian National League yesterday: The league had an income for the quarter of $2,057.77; expenses were $761.04; cash left on hand, $1,296.04 [sic].
The president, Dr. Carl Sandberg, proposed to issue collection lists in order to raise the funds necessary to carry on the work. It was decided to revise the bylaws at the next convention.
